name: 51Give
tag_list: china, microfinance, green, environment, carbon, microloan, sustainable-development
overview: 51Give has developed a platform that provides opportunities for people to connect with and invest in individual small-to-medium carbon friendly enterprises in the rural China through soft loans. 51Give aims to alleviate poverty and improve standards of living in rural China while working toward environmentally friendly development by financially supporting entrepreneurs. 51Give utilizes partners within existing microfinance institutions (MFIs) to identify viable green entrepreneurial projects and facilitate the administration of loans. Loan capital is raised through 51Give’s online platform, where users can contribute to a specific project, continue to be updated on its progress, and receive their money back, with a small amount of interest.
